name: Country Gospel
description: Traditional Country that heavily incorporates Gospel.

children.name: Bluegrass Gospel
children.description: Incorporates the religious topics and harmony vocals found in Country Gospel.

name: Jubilee
description: Rooted in African-American culture, characterized by complex rhythms and call-and-response vocals.

name: Sacred Steel
description: Focused on instrumentals and played on the steel guitar.

name: Southern Gospel
description: Initially sung A cappella by a Vocal Group quartet, sometimes with a pianist or guitar as accompaniment, with lyrics and messages primarily revolving around the teachings found within Christianity.

name: Traditional Black Gospel
description: Born out of Spirituals in the early 20th century with influence from Southern Gospel and Blues, often featuring passionate or energetic vocal performances, motifs of salvation, and testaments of hardship.
